short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrates Flowcaster meeting and review session with Google apps such as Calendar, Gmail and Contacts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick and easy access to FlowCaster Live's group review, meeting and approval tools.
Our extension provides a quick start icon in the toolbar to start a new meeting/group review, or schedule on on your calendar.
Within the calendar edit dialog, flowcaster.live links can be inserted to setup meetings in the future as part of the calendar event.
